Articles.Content: I\'m currently making a KSP theme for fun over the summer. If it is good, is there any chance of it being incorporated into the actual game?
Well the loading screen art was done by a fan of the game. So yes your theme could be implemented.
best thing you can do is put it up as a poll. Game is paid by supporting members like you and I, so do it up, and if good, I would support!

I thought about doing something similar but my style would almost definately not suit. Regardless of whether it gets included in the game or not, you should certainly post it up here - I\'d love to hear what someone else thinks the KSP theme should sound like!
This would be fantastic! I was contemplating this aswell and it sounded, in my head like a mix between 2001 and Ride of the Valkyries! Please go through with this!
